description:
Tanrou is a Honshuu Wolf shikigami used by Yura Keikain. He has green eyes and is frequently used as a means of transportation by his owner. He is named for the star Dubhe of the constellation Ursa Major, which was called "Tanrou" in scriptures from China`s Tang Dynasty.
Source: nurarihyonnomago.wikia.com
name: Tanrou
